Issue.creator: krw910
Issue.summary: Support the commands "send GET_ATTR", "send GET_SCHEMA", "send GET_CLAIM_DEF" in CLI
Issue.description: The transactions {{GET_ATTR}}, {{GET_SCHEMA}}, {{GET_CLAIM_DEF}} have already been implemented in sovrin-node. However, the corresponding commands {{send GET_ATTR}}, {{send GET_SCHEMA}}, {{send GET_CLAIM_DEF}} are not supported in CLI now. In scope of this task, support these commands in CLI.
